title: Fix blank screen when editing a Field on the Field Details page

requirements.text: Fix the blank-screen crash that occurs when the user opens the Edit Field flow from the Field Details page by making the EditFieldDialog icon picker resilient to missing/invalid Lucide icon component names (e.g., skip unknown icons or render a safe fallback icon instead of throwing during render).

quotes: fix error: tyring to edit a field I get blank screen

acceptanceCriteria: From the Field Details page, clicking the "Edit" button opens the Edit Field dialog without a blank screen crash.
If any icon name in the predefined icon list is not available in the installed lucide-react bundle, the dialog still renders (unknown icons are safely skipped or replaced with a fallback).
No uncaught exceptions are thrown during rendering of the Edit Field dialog icon grid.

requirements.text: Add a React-level error boundary for the Field Details page area so that if a runtime error still occurs while rendering FieldDetailView and its dialogs, the app shows a user-friendly in-app error state (with a retry/back action) instead of a blank screen.

quotes: fix error: tyring to edit a field I get blank screen

acceptanceCriteria: If a rendering error occurs within the Field Details page view/components, the UI displays an error panel with clear English text and an action to recover (e.g., go back to Dashboard and/or retry).
The rest of the app remains usable after recovering (no full blank screen).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts (read-only).
Keep backend architecture as a single Motoko actor; no additional backend services.
nonGoals: Adding new field/task features beyond fixing the edit crash and improving error handling.
Changing the data model or performing backend state migrations.
